availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel Wheeler (Johnson County, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Lawrence County, Kentucky native. Son of William R. Wheeler and Elizabeth Wheeler. Married to Mary Salyer Wheeler on December 30, 1852. Father of Mahala Wheeler, Greenville P. Wheeler, Benjamin R. Wheeler, Elizabeth Wheeler, and William F. Wheeler. Resident in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia as sergeant from May 21, 1864 to June 21, 1864.
